Name: Blood worms
Effect: Whenever you take damage to your hit points, you take an additional 1d4 poison damage.
Duration: 12 - your Endurance score number of hours.

Name: Bone worms
Effect: Whenever you take damage to your hit points, you gain a random limb condition. (Roll a d6 to determine which limb, 1 for eyes, 2 for head, 3 for arms, 4 or legs, 5 for torso, or 6 for groin)
Duration: 12 - your Endurance score number of hours.

Name: Buzz brain
Effect: You have disadvantage on any Intelligence ability or skill checks.
Duration: You are no longer affected by this disease after you sleep.
Cure: x1 food or chem with the stimulant property.

Name: Dysentery
Effect: You gain four levels of Dehydration that cannot be removed until you no longer have this disease.
Duration: 15 - your Endurance score number of days (minimum 1).
Cure: x2 antibiotics, each one taken one day apart.

Name: Fever
Effect: Your maximum action points are reduced by 3 to a minimum of 6 and you have disadvantage on all d20 rolls.
Duration: 2 days if your Endurance score is 6 or higher. 4 days if your Endurance score is 5 or less.
Cure: x1 Med-X suppresses the effects of a fever by 1d4 hours.

Name: Flap limb
Effect: You have disadvantage on any checks, skill checks, or attack rolls using Strength.
Duration: You are no longer affected by this disease after you sleep.

Name: Glowing pustules
Effect: Whenever you take damage to your hit points, you and each creature within 10 feet of you gain one level of Rads.
Duration: 15 - your Endurance score number of days (minimum 1).
Cure: x2 antibiotics, each one taken one day apart.

Name: Heat flashes
Effect: You have disadvantage on any Endurance ability or skill checks.
Duration: 12 - your Endurance score number of hours.
Cure: You are no longer affected by this disease after you sleep so long as you have no levels of dehydration.

Name: Jelly fingers
Effect: Attacking with a ranged weapon costs 1 additional action point.
Duration: 12 - your Endurance score number of hours.

Name: Lock joint
Effect: Attacking with a melee weapon costs 1 additional action point.
Duration: 12 - your Endurance score number of hours.

Name: Needle spine
Effect: Your carry load is halved.
Duration: 2 days if your Endurance score is 6 or higher. 4 days if your Endurance score is 5 or less.

Name: Parasites
Effect: You gain four levels of Hunger that cannot be removed until you no longer have this disease.
Duration: 2 days if your Endurance score is 6 or higher. 4 days if your Endurance score is 5 or less.

Name: Rad worms
Effect: You gain one level of radiation whenever you sleep.
Duration: 12 - your Endurance score number of days (minimum 1).
Cure: x2 rad-away, each one taken one day apart.

Name: Rattle hands
Effect: Whenever you deal damage from an attack with a ranged weapon, the damage is reduced by 2 (to a minimum of 1).
Duration: 12 - your Endurance score number of days (minimum 1).
Cure: x1 chem with the sedative property.

Name: Sludge lung
Effect: Your maximum AP is reduced by 2 to a minimum of 6 and you can only move a maximum of 20 feet on your turn.
Duration: 12 - your Endurance score number of days (minimum 1).
Cure: x2 antibiotics, each one taken one day apart.

Name: Snot ear
Effect: You have disadvantage on any checks, skill checks, or attack rolls using Perception.
Duration: 2 days if your Endurance score is 6 or higher. 4 days if your Endurance score is 5 or less.

Name: Swamp gas
Effect: You have disadvantage on any Charisma ability or skill checks.
Duration: 2 days if your Endurance score is 6 or higher. 4 days if your Endurance score is 5 or less.

Name: Swamp itch
Effect: You have disadvantage on any checks, skill checks, or attack rolls using Agility.
Duration: 2 days if your Endurance score is 6 or higher. 4 days if your Endurance score is 5 or less.

Name: Weeping sores
Effect: Whenever you take damage to your hit points, you gain one level of bleeding.
Duration: 2 days if your Endurance score is 6 or higher. 4 days if your Endurance score is 5 or less.

Name: The Whoopsies
Effect: You have disadvantage on any checks, skill checks, or attack rolls using Luck.
Duration: 12 - your Endurance score number of days.
Cure: x1 Nuka cola quantum, or tossing 2d20 caps into the ocean, a lake, river, or fountain. If you take back the caps, you are re-afflicted by the Woopsies.
